name: Confetti
description:
Confetti is the wedding app for the thoughtful couple -- we automate the guest experience so that couples can focus on celebrating their love with the people that they love.

We are building an event operating system that optimizes for connectivity between guests and hosts which enables effective communication and a more memorable guest experience that increases fun and gifting at the event.
one_liner:
Confetti is the wedding app for the thoughtful couple -- we automate the guest experience so that couples can focus on celebrating their love with the people that they love.

We are building an event operating system that optimizes for connectivity between guests and hosts which enables effective communication and a more memorable guest experience that increases fun and gifting at the event.
